metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata

Documentation_Link.Text:
FREE AIR CO2 ENRICHMENT (FACE) DATA REPORT: FACTS-II (RHINELANDER, WISCONSIN) (http://cdiac.ess-dive.lbl.gov/programs/FACE/facts-IIdata/factsIIdata.html) CO2 DATA ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
QUALITY-ASSURANCE CHECKS AND DATA-PROCESSING ACTIVITIES PERFORMED BY THE FACTS-II FACE PROJECT AND CDIAC -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
All data were checked for appropriate format.
For each variable, the range of values was checked for unrealistically large or small values.
The CO2 values were checked for consecutively repeating identical values.
The DOY (day of the year) values were verified from the specified combinations of MONTH and DAY.
LIST OF FILES ------------- File name File description
co21998r1-2.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 1.2 co21998r1-4.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 1.4 co21998r2-2.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 2.2 co21998r2-4.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 2.4 co21998r3-2.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 3.2 co21998r3-4.csv 1998 co2 data from ring 3.4 co21999r1-2.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 1.2 co21999r1-4.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 1.4 co21999r2-2.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 2.2 co21999r2-4.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 2.4 co21999r3-2.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 3.2 co21999r3-4.csv 1999 co2 data from ring 3.4 co22000r1-2.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 1.2 co22000r1-4.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 1.4 co22000r2-2.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 2.2 co22000r2-4.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 2.4 co22000r3-2.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 3.2 co22000r3-4.csv 2000 co2 data from ring 3.4 co22001r1-2.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 1.2 co22001r1-4.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 1.4 co22001r2-2.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 2.2 co22001r2-4.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 2.4 co22001r3-2.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 3.2 co22001r3-4.csv 2001 co2 data from ring 3.4 co22002r1-2.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 1.2 co22002r1-4.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 1.4 co22002r2-2.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 2.2 co22002r2-4.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 2.4 co22002r3-2.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 3.2 co22002r3-4.csv 2002 co2 data from ring 3.4 co22004r1-2.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 1.2 co22004r1-4.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 1.4 co22004r2-2.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 2.2 co22004r2-4.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 2.4 co22004r3-2.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 3.2 co22004r3-4.csv 2004 co2 data from ring 3.4
DESCRIPTION and FORMAT OF THE ASCII DATA FILES ---------------------------------------------- The files described herein are all ascii comma-delimited (also known as comma-separated-variable) files, in which columns are of varying width and, consequently, lines are of varying length. Variables within a line are separated by commas. Commas do not appear in the files except as separators between variables. The first line in each data file is a header, providing the variable names.
********** Contents and format of the files co2*.csv:
Column Variable Units Definition and comments
1 YEAR y Year, in CCYY format
2 RING Experimental ring
3 MONTH m Month of the year (1 = January, ..., 12 = December)
4 DAY d Day of the month (1 through 31)
5 HOUR h Hour (0 through 23)
6 N Number of observations (after excluding missing and outlying values) used to derive mean
7 CO2 ppm Arithmetic mean concentration of CO2
8 DOY d Day of the year (1 = 1 January, ..., 365 or 366 = 31 December)
The missing-value indicator in this file is -999.99 for the variable CO2.
